Package com.c1games.terminal.algo.io

Class DefaultGameIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c1games.terminal.algo.io.DefaultGameIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameIO
    public class DefaultGameIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameIO
    The default implementation of game IO which interacts with the game engine through the standard input, output, and error.

      FrameData lastFrame()
      Get the last frame returned by nextTurnFrame or nextFrameAnyType.

      Wait for the next frame data from the engine for any type.
      GameState nextMoveBuilder()
      Wait for the next turn frame, and then use it to construct a move builder.
      FrameData nextTurnFrame()
      Waits for the next frame from the engine of the Action phase, which corresponds to the beginning of the turn.
      void submitTurn​(GameState builder)
      Given a set of moves created by a move buider, submit those to the engine as our actions for this turn.

    • Method Detail

      • config

        public Config config()
        Description copied from interface: GameIO
        Get the deserialized config file, possibly waiting to receive this from the game. This many block initially, since the game needs time to send over the config file, but will only block once, for the same reason.
        Specified by:
        config in interface GameIO

      • nextFrameAnyType

        public FrameData nextFrameAnyType()
        Description copied from interface: GameIO
        Wait for the next frame data from the engine for any type. There are several frames per turn. Many algos will prefer to call nextTurnFrame. Nullable
        Specified by:
        nextFrameAnyType in interface GameIO

      • nextTurnFrame

        public FrameData nextTurnFrame()
        Description copied from interface: GameIO
        Waits for the next frame from the engine of the Action phase, which corresponds to the beginning of the turn. This will skip over any frames which are not of that type. Nullable.
        Specified by:
        nextTurnFrame in interface GameIO

      • nextMoveBuilder

        public GameState nextMoveBuilder()
        Description copied from interface: GameIO
        Wait for the next turn frame, and then use it to construct a move builder.
        Specified by:
        nextMoveBuilder in interface GameIO

      • lastFrame

        public FrameData lastFrame()
        Description copied from interface: GameIO
        Get the last frame returned by nextTurnFrame or nextFrameAnyType. Nullable.
        Specified by:
        lastFrame in interface GameIO

      • submitTurn

        public void submitTurn​(GameState builder)
        Description copied from interface: GameIO
        Given a set of moves created by a move buider, submit those to the engine as our actions for this turn.
        Specified by:
        submitTurn in interface GameIO
